meaningMnemonic: If you want to <radical>fix</radical> a <radical>tree</radical> you have to <kanji>plant</kanji> it. It's pretty obvious that digging up the tree broke it. So fix it by planting it again. That is how plants work.
readingMnemonic: If you don't <kanji>plant</kanji> a tree it goes into <reading>shock</reading> (しょく). Which, honestly, shouldn't be very shocking to you, since it's a tree.
